entry.title: n次根号下的(kn)!
entry.content:
命题:
$\sqrt[n]{(kn!)} \sim (\frac{kn}{e})^k~(k\in \mathbb{Z_+}, n\to \infty)$, 即 $\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{n^{k}}=\left(\frac{k}{e}\right)^{k}$

证明:(答案可左滑)
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
&\ln \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{n^{k}}=\frac{1}{n} \ln \frac{(k n) !}{n^{k n}}=\frac{1}{n} \sum\limits_{i=1}^{k n} \ln \frac{i}{n}\
\
&\Rightarrow \lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} \ln \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{n^{k}}=\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{n} \sum\limits{i=1}^{k n} \ln \frac{i}{n}=\int{0}^{k} \ln xd x=k \ln k-k\
\
&\Rightarrow \lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{n^{k}}=e^{\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \ln \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{n^{k}}}=e^{k \ln k-k}=\left(\frac{k}{e}\right)^{k}\
\
&\Rightarrow \sqrt[n]{(k n) !} \sim\left(\frac{k n}{e}\right)^{k} (n\to \infty)
\end{array}
}$$

另证:
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
由Sstirling公式：n!\sim \sqrt{2\pi n}(\frac{n}{e})^n\
\
\Rightarrow \lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sqrt[n]{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi kn}}} \cdot \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{(kn)^{k}}=(\frac{1}{e})^k\
\
\Rightarrow \lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{n^{k}}=\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sqrt[n]{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi kn}}}\cdot\frac{\sqrt[n]{(k n) !}}{(kn)^{k}}\cdot k^k=(\frac{k}{e})^k\
\
\Rightarrow \sqrt[n]{(k n) !} \sim\left(\frac{k n}{e}\right)^{k} (n\to \infty)
\end{array}
}$$

例1:

证明级数$\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt[n]{n!}}{n}极限$.
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
n \to \infty 时, \frac{\sqrt[n]{n!}}{n} \sim \frac{1}{e} \Rightarrow \lim\limits _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{\sqrt[n]{n!}}{n}=\frac{1}{e}
\end{array}
}$$

例2:
级数$\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(n!)^2}{(2n)!}$收敛.

证明:
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
n \to \infty 时,\sqrt[n]{\frac{(n!)^2}{(2n)!}} =\frac{\sqrt[n]{n!}\cdot \sqrt[n]{n!}}{n\cdot n}\cdot \frac{n^2}{\sqrt[n]{(2n)!}} \sim \frac{1}{e} \cdot \frac{1}{e} \cdot (\frac{e}{2})^2=\frac{1}{4} \lt 1\
\
则由根式判别法可知级数收敛
\end{array}
}$$

entry.title: 《Stirling公式》
entry.content:
Stirling公式：
$n\to +\infty时$ ,$n ! \sim \sqrt{2 \pi n}\left(\frac{n}{e}\right)^{n}$,即$\lim \limits_{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{n !}{\sqrt{2 \pi n}\left(\frac{n}{e}\right)^{n}}=1$

其它等价形式：
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{e^{n} n !}{n^{n} \sqrt{n}}=\sqrt{2 \pi}\
\
\frac{1}{n !} \sim \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi n}\left(\frac{n}{e}\right)^{n}}, \quad(n \rightarrow+\infty)\
\
\frac{1}{n !} \sim \frac{e^{n}}{n^{n} \sqrt{2 \pi n}}, \quad(n \rightarrow+\infty)
\end{array}
}
$$

证明：
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
利用Wallis公式, \frac{\pi}{2}=\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{\left[\frac{(2 n) ! !}{(2 n-1) ! !}\right]^{2}}{2 n+1}\
\
\begin{aligned}
\frac{\pi}{2}&=\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{\left[\frac{(2 n) ! !}{(2 n-1) ! !}\right]^{2}}{2 n+1}\
&\
&=\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{\left[\frac{(2 n) ! !(2 n) ! !}{(2 n) !}\right]^{2}}{2 n+1}\
\
&=\lim \limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{2^{4 n}\left[\frac{(n !)^{2}}{(2 n) !}\right]^{2}}{2 n+1}\
&\
&=\lim \limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{2^{4 n}\left[\frac{\left(A n^{n+\frac{1}{2}} e^{-n}\right)^{2}}{A(2 n)^{2 n+\frac{1}{2}} e^{-2 n}}\right]^{2}}{2 n+1}\
&\
&=\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{2^{4 n}\left(2^{-2 n-\frac{1}{2}} A \sqrt{n}\right)^{2}}{2 n+1}\
&\
&=\lim\limits _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{2^{4 n} A^{2} 2^{-4 n-1} * n}{2 n+1}\
\
&=\frac{A^{2}}{4}
\end{aligned}\
\
所以 A=\sqrt{2 \pi}\
\
\begin{aligned}
&\lim _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{n !}{n^{n+\frac{1}{2}} e^{-n}}=\sqrt{2 \pi} \
&\
&\text { 即 } \lim _{n \rightarrow+\infty} \frac{\sqrt{2 \pi n} n^{n} e^{-n}}{n !}=1
\end{aligned}
\end{array}
}$$

entry.title: 一道有意思的级数重排问题
entry.content:
之前在知乎上回答的一个级数重排的问题。

问题:
设$0<\alpha<1$, 将级数 $\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{(-1)^{n-1}}{n^{\alpha}}$ 按照每 $p$ 个正项后为 $q$ 个负项的规则进行重排, 但保持正项之间和负项之间的原有顺序, 证明：重排后的级数当且仅当 $p=q$ 时收敛.

此证明在一个月所答, 起初想到的是用莱布尼茨判别法证明充分性,用柯西判别法来反证必要性，证明方法位于文后的(题目另证)。现在深入学习级数理论与积分理论，我有了另外的证明方法。

第一种方法引理1参考了李杨强化讲义及证明思路部分参考知乎第一楼回答；第二种方法为个人所想, 笔者学识不才, 如有疑问与指正请留言。

引理1:
若 $\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} u{n}=0$, 且$ S_{n}=\sum\limits_{k=1}^{n} u_{k} $有一个子列 $S_{p n} $($p$为固定整数）收敛, 则 $\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty} u_{n} $收敛。

证明: (可左滑,电脑阅读效果最佳)
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} S{n} 存在 \Longleftrightarrow \lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} S{pn+q}(q=0,1,2, \cdots, p-1) 存在且相等\
\
而 \lim \limits_{n \rightarrow \infty} S_{p n+q}=\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} S{p n}+\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty}\left(u{p n+1}+\cdots+u_{p n+q}\right)=\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} S{p n}\
\
即 \sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty} u_{n}=\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} S{n}=\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} S{p n}
\end{array}
}
$$

引理2:
$\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} n^{\alpha-1} \cdot \sum\limits{k=1}^{n} \frac{1}{k^{\alpha}}=\frac{1}{1-\alpha} \quad(\alpha \neq 1)$，即$\sum\limits_{k=1}^{n} \frac{1}{k^\alpha}=\frac{n^{1-\alpha}}{1-\alpha}+\alpha_{n}\left(\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} \alpha{n}=0\right)$

证明:
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} n^{\alpha-1} \cdot \sum\limits{k=1}^{n} \frac{1}{k^{\alpha}}=\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{n} \sum\limits{k=1}^{n} \frac{1}{\left(\frac{k}{n}\right)^{\alpha}}=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{1}{x^{\alpha}} d x=\frac{1}{1-\alpha}
\end{array}
}$$

题目证明:

$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
\begin{aligned}
S_{(p+q)n}& =\left(\frac{1}{1^{\alpha}}+\frac{1}{3^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{\left.(2p-1)^{\alpha}\right.}\right)-\left(\frac{1}{2^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{(2 q)^{\alpha}}\right)+\cdots+ \
& \left[\frac{1}{[2(n-1) p+1]^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{(2 p n-1)^{\alpha}}\right]-\left[\frac{1}{[2(q(n-1)+1)]^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{(2 q n)^{\alpha}}\right] \
& =\sum_{k=1}^{p n} \frac{1}{(2 k-1)^{\alpha}}-\sum_{k=1}^{q n} \frac{1}{(2 k)^{\alpha}} \
& =\sum_{k=1}^{2pn} \frac{1}{k^{\alpha}}-\sum_{k=1}^{p n} \frac{1}{(2 k)^{\alpha}}-\sum_{k=1}^{q n} \frac{1}{(2 k)^{\alpha}} \
& =\sum_{k=1}^{2pn} \frac{1}{k^{\alpha}}-\frac{1}{2^ \alpha}\left(\sum_{k=1}^{p n} \frac{1}{k^{\alpha}}+\sum_{k=1}^{q n} \frac{1}{k^{\alpha}}\right) \
&=\frac{(2pn)^{1-\alpha}}{1-\alpha}+\alpha_n-\frac{1}{2^\alpha}[\frac{(pn)^{1-\alpha}}{1-\alpha}+\frac{(qn)^{1-\alpha}}{1-\alpha}+\beta_n+\gamma_n]\
& =\frac{n^{1-\alpha}}{2^{\alpha}(1-\alpha)}\left(p^{1-\alpha}-q^{1-\alpha}\right)+\alpha_{n}-\frac{1}{2^\alpha}\left(\beta_{n}+r_{n}\right)
\end{aligned}\
\
由0\lt \alpha \lt 1知\lim\limits {n \rightarrow \infty}n^{1-\alpha}=+\infty , 则\sum\limits{n=1}^{\infty} u_{n}收敛\Leftrightarrow S_{(p+q)n}收敛\Leftrightarrow p=q
\end{array}
}$$

题目另证：
$$
\bbox[#F5F5F5,10px]
{
\begin{array}{l}
\begin{array}{l}
令 a_{2 m-1}=\frac{1}{[(2 m-2) p+1]^{\alpha}}+\frac{1}{[(2 m-2) p+3]^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{[2 m p-1]^{\alpha}}, a_{2 m}=\frac{1}{[(2 m-2) q+2]^{\alpha}}+\frac{1}{\left[(2 m -2) q+4]^{\alpha}\right.}+\cdots+\frac{1}{(2 m q)^{\alpha}}
\end{array}\
\
必要性： 若重排级数收敛且 p \neq q, 不妨设 p>q\
\
\begin{aligned}
m>1 时, \left|a_{2 m}-a_{2 m-1}\right| &=\mid \frac{1}{[(2 m-2) q+1]^{\alpha}}-\frac{1}{[(2m-2) p+1]^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{[(2 m-2) q]^{\alpha}}-\frac{1}{\left[(2m-2)q-1]^{\alpha}\right.}+\cdots+\frac{1}{[2 mp-1]^{\alpha}}| \
&>\frac{1}{[(2m-2)q+1]^{\alpha}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{(2 mp-1))^{\alpha}}>\frac{1}{(2 m p-1)^{\alpha}} \
\end{aligned}\
\
\begin{aligned}
\Rightarrow\left|S_{4 m+4}-S_{2 m}\right| &=\mid\left(a_{4m+4}-a_{4m+3}\right)+\cdots+\left(a_{2 m+2}-a_{2 m+1} \mid\right.\
& \geqslant\left|a_{4 m+4}-a_{4m+3}\right|+\cdots+\left|a_{2 m+2}-a_{2 m+1}\right| \
&>\frac{m+1}{(4 m+3)^{\alpha}}=\frac{1}{4^{\alpha}} \cdot \frac{m+1}{\left(m+\frac{1}{4}\right)^{\alpha}}>\frac{1}{4^{\alpha}}
\end{aligned}\
\
\begin{aligned}
取 \varepsilon_{0}=\frac{1}{4^{\alpha}}, \forall m, \exists n_{1}=4 m+4>m, n_{2}=2 m>m 时, 有 \left|S_{4 m+4}-S_{2 m}\right|>\frac{1}{4^{\alpha}}=\varepsilon_{0} 即级数发散, 与命题矛盾, 则 p=q.\
\end{aligned}\
\
\begin{array}{l}
充分性：若 p=q,a_{2 m-1}-a_{2 m}>0, a_{2 m}-a_{2 m+1}>0 \Rightarrow\left{a_{m}\right}严格递减, \lim \limits_{m \rightarrow \infty} a_{2 m-1}=\lim\limits {m \rightarrow \infty} a{2 m}=0 (p, q有限),由莱布尼茨判别法知收敛.
\end{array}
\end{array}
}$$

【内容为个人所答，难免会有错误，请予指正留言】
